testcase.name: Verify MagicBricksApp login functionality with invalid emailid - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and MagicBricksApp is launched.......................passed Then User navigates on Landing Page.........................................passed When User clicks on Login button............................................passed Then User Navigates to Login Page...........................................passed Then User enters incorrect Emailid "@@@@@"..................................passed Then User gets error message................................................passed

testcase.name: Verify MagicBricksApp login functionality with invalid password - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and MagicBricksApp is launched.......................passed Then User navigates on Landing Page.........................................passed When User clicks on Login button............................................passed Then User Navigates to Login Page...........................................passed When User enters correct EmailId............................................passed Then User enters incorrect Password "@@@"...................................passed And User clicks on Login Button.............................................passed Then User gets error message................................................passed
